overview:
Jim Vecchio is the co-founder of EpiAnalytics, Inc., a privately-held Southern California text analytics and automation solution provider.

EpiAnalytics is a Saas based, AppExchange Partner focused on integrating advanced text analytics and sentiment analysis with existing business processes including customer care, voice-of-the-customer, Net Promoter programs, Surveys, and social media to better manage and monetize customer comments.

Jim is an entrepreneur, lawyer and technologist with a background in corporate law, contact centers, enterprise feedback management, small business startups, product development, sales & marketing management, and business development.

As a Director of EpiAnalytics, Jim functions as a source of knowledge and strategy in both the immediate and long term goals of the company in the areas of corporate governance, business development, and marketing. Under this leadership, EpiAnalytics quickly established itself as a trusted partner / vendor with several Fortune 500 clients.

degrees.subject: Law
degrees.institution: Michigan State University (Detroit College of Law)
